divs: Sighting DetailsMy dad called me out side to see what he was looking at and they were the same orbs that we observed several times at our home. I looked up and started watching them. Than noticed that the one wasn't the only one. Than I noticed more and more. In all i must have counted over 16 white orbs right over my house in all directions just hovering in place. Than some of them began to move and I saw 3 of the orbs make a perfect triangle. The orbs started to disappear. I've never seen anything like what i just seen before. and there were several members of my family that seen what i did. After we watch two other in different locations fading in and out of sight but in the same path.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in West Covina
There was one other sighting in West Covina on or around January 24th 2010
